text: While there is no way to do this in app (this is a great idea btw and i will pass this along to the corresponding team) you could do this via Postman with its collector functionality and using our API's.

Many website themes require CTAs but not all tiers of HubSpot have access to CTAs, please upvote this idea to make themes more compatible for all HubSpot tiers:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-some-level-of-access-to-CTA-in-every-tier-of-CMS-Hub/idi-p/696803#M123711>
Or just allow the fields to exist but disable them. That way you could leave them in
But I agree, we have also had to make a alternate version of our theme
Whatever the solution, I think compatibility across tiers is a basic requirement.
Wait... did they do that? I just installed a theme that has CTAs...
Hmm but I cant even edit the module... And the CLI doesnt work. Nevermind yeah it doesnt work
It definitely doesn't work, we had someone downgrade and they lost all editing capabilities
Please make modules created in the CLI usable in content by default. If I dont want them usable then I will set it that way.
